#summary Instructions for setting up the CARPE-binary
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

Download 3rdPartyDependencies.zip and unzip.  Install each .exe file and follow the onscreen instructions, clicking next when appropriate.  Next download CARPE-binary.zip and unzip to a directory.  Launch the file diemdroi.exe.  You should be prompted to "select the eye-tracking movie file".  Select any file located in data/video.
